testcase.name: Permission restrictions on a page
testcase.system-out: Given I am in the login page................................................passed And I login with userName as "rekhasndr@gmail.com" and password as "Jan@2013".passed Then I should see "Dashboard"...............................................passed And I create a user with username as "testpermissions" and email as "testuser@gmail.com".passed Then I should see "1 user has been created."................................passed When I navigate to page "sampletestPage"....................................passed Then I should see "sampletestPage"..........................................passed And I associate the restriction of "Can view" to the user "testpermissions".passed
